title: Star Wars: Episode IV – A New Hope
synopsis: A farm boy joins a rebellion to defeat an evil empire, guided by a wise mentor and a rogue pilot, using a mystical force.

title: Jaws
synopsis: A police chief, a marine biologist, and a grizzled fisherman hunt a massive great white shark terrorizing a beach town.

title: The Godfather
synopsis: The aging patriarch of a crime family transfers control to his reluctant son, sparking betrayal and power struggles.

title: M*A*S*H
synopsis: Surgeons at a mobile army hospital during the Korean War use humor and defiance to cope with the horrors of war.

title: Rocky
synopsis: A small-time boxer gets a rare chance to fight the heavyweight champion, training hard to prove himself.

title: All in the Family
synopsis: A working-class bigot clashes with his liberal family, sparking debates on social issues in 1970s America.

title: Alien
synopsis: A commercial spaceship crew encounters a deadly extraterrestrial organism that hunts them one by one.

title: Apocalypse Now
synopsis: A U.S. Army captain ventures into the jungle to assassinate a rogue colonel during the Vietnam War.

title: Happy Days
synopsis: A wholesome 1950s family navigates life, love, and friendship, centered around a cool teenager and his pals.

title: Taxi Driver
synopsis: A mentally unstable Vietnam veteran becomes a vigilante, obsessed with saving a young girl in New York City.

title: Back to the Future
synopsis: A teenager is accidentally sent to 1955 in a time-traveling car, racing to fix the future and get back home.

title: The Breakfast Club
synopsis: Five high school students from different cliques bond during a Saturday detention, revealing their true selves.

title: Blade Runner
synopsis: A retired cop hunts bioengineered humanoids in a dystopian future, questioning humanity and his own existence.

title: Cheers
synopsis: A group of regulars at a Boston bar share laughs, love, and life lessons with the bar’s charming staff.
director: Various (created by Glen and Les Charles)

title: Die Hard
synopsis: A New York cop battles terrorists led by a cunning mastermind to save hostages, including his wife, in a skyscraper.

title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
synopsis: A boy befriends a stranded alien, helping it return home while hiding it from government forces.

title: The Shining
synopsis: A writer descends into madness while caretaking an isolated hotel, endangering his family as supernatural forces emerge.

title: Miami Vice
synopsis: Two undercover cops tackle drug lords and corruption in Miami’s flashy, dangerous underworld.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
synopsis: An archaeologist races Nazis to find a mystical artifact, battling danger and betrayal in a global adventure.

title: The Terminator
synopsis: A cyborg assassin from the future hunts a woman whose unborn son could save humanity from machines.

title: Pulp Fiction
synopsis: Interwoven stories of criminals, hitmen, and a boxer collide in a nonlinear tale of violence and redemption.

title: The Lion King
synopsis: A young lion prince flees after his father’s murder, returning years later to reclaim his rightful throne.

title: Seinfeld
synopsis: A stand-up comedian and his quirky friends navigate absurd situations in New York City, obsessing over the mundane.
director: Various (created by Larry David, Jerry Seinfeld)

title: Jurassic Park
synopsis: Scientists and guests face deadly dinosaurs when a theme park’s security fails, unleashing prehistoric chaos.

title: The X-Files
synopsis: Two FBI agents investigate paranormal cases, uncovering conspiracies and questioning reality itself.

title: Schindler's List
synopsis: A German industrialist risks everything to save Jews during the Holocaust, turning his factory into a refuge.

title: Friends
synopsis: Six young adults in New York City share laughs, love, and life’s ups and downs in a tight-knit group.
director: Various (created by David Crane, Marta Kauffman)

title: Forrest Gump
synopsis: A kind-hearted man with a low IQ lives an extraordinary life, influencing history while chasing his childhood love.

title: The Matrix
synopsis: A hacker discovers reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion to fight the machines controlling humanity.

title: Titanic
synopsis: A romance between a wealthy woman and a poor artist unfolds aboard the doomed Titanic, ending in tragedy.

title: Goodfellas
synopsis: A young man rises in the mob, enjoying power and wealth, but paranoia and betrayal unravel his world.

title: ER
synopsis: Doctors and nurses in a Chicago hospital face life-and-death emergencies while juggling personal dramas.

title: Fight Club
synopsis: A disillusioned man forms an underground fight club with a charismatic stranger, spiraling into anarchy.

title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
synopsis: A Philly teen moves to a wealthy L.A. suburb, shaking up his posh relatives with his streetwise attitude.
director: Various (created by Andy and Susan Borowitz)

title: Saving Private Ryan
synopsis: A squad of soldiers searches for a paratrooper behind enemy lines during WWII, facing brutal combat.

title: Home Alone
synopsis: A boy accidentally left behind at Christmas outsmarts bumbling burglars to protect his family’s house.

title: Beverly Hills, 90210
synopsis: Teens in a wealthy zip code navigate love, friendship, and drama in and out of high school.

title: Clueless
synopsis: A shallow but charming teen in Beverly Hills plays matchmaker and learns about life and love.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
synopsis: An FBI trainee seeks a jailed cannibalistic killer’s help to catch another serial killer, racing against time.

title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
synopsis: A teen girl battles vampires and demons as a destined slayer, balancing high school and heroism.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
synopsis: A reprogrammed cyborg protects a teen from a liquid-metal assassin to prevent a future apocalypse.

title: Boyz n the Hood
synopsis: Three friends in South Central L.A. face gang violence and tough choices as they chase their dreams.

title: Twin Peaks
synopsis: An FBI agent investigates a teen’s murder in a quirky town, uncovering dark secrets and surreal mysteries.
director: Various (created by David Lynch, Mark Frost)

title: The Shawshank Redemption
synopsis: A wrongly convicted banker forms a bond with a fellow inmate, finding hope in a brutal prison.

title: Dazed and Confused
synopsis: Teens in 1976 celebrate the last day of school, cruising, partying, and facing life’s next steps.

title: Roseanne
synopsis: A working-class family tackles life’s challenges with humor, love, and blunt honesty in small-town America.

title: Ghostbusters
synopsis: Three quirky scientists start a ghost-catching business in New York, battling supernatural threats.

title: Pretty Woman
synopsis: A wealthy businessman hires a spirited escort, and their unlikely romance blossoms despite social divides.

title: The Cosby Show
synopsis: A Brooklyn doctor and his lawyer wife raise their lively kids, blending humor with family values.

title: Reservoir Dogs
synopsis: A botched heist leaves a group of thieves paranoid, suspecting a traitor as tensions boil over.
